allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Measure-Command { curl.exe -X POST http://localhost:3003/api/analyze -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -d ''{""walletAddress"":""GThUX1Atko4tqhN2NaiTazWSeFWMuiUvfFnyJyUghFMJ""}'' } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TotalSeconds")
Bash(timeout 300 bash -c 'while true; do curl -s ""http://localhost:3003/api/monitor/active"" 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""\\""count\\"":[0-9]*"" && sleep 10; done')

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do if psql ""$DATABASE_URL"" -t -c ""SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM wallet_analyses WHERE wallet_address = ''''5xY5tp2bgbcejpNFryr5evcwEBBaQGutnbndhm4rRcv4'''' AND analysis_status = ''''completed''''"" 2>/dev/null | grep -q ""1""; then node debug-wallet.js 5xY5tp2bgbcejpNFryr5evcwEBBaQGutnbndhm4rRcv4; break; fi; sleep 2; done')

Bash(timeout 60 bash -c 'while true; do status=$\(curl -s http://localhost:3003/api/wallet/5xY5tp2bgbcejpNFryr5evcwEBBaQGutnbndhm4rRcv4/summary 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""\\""analysis_status\\"":\\""[^\\""]*\\"""" | cut -d""\\"""" -f4\); echo ""Status: $status""; if [ ""$status"" = ""completed"" ]; then echo ""Analysis complete!""; break; fi; if [ ""$status"" = ""failed"" ]; then echo ""Analysis failed!""; break; fi; sleep 3; done')

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do if psql ""$DATABASE_URL"" -t -c ""SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM wallet_analyses WHERE wallet_address = ''''5xY5tp2bgbcejpNFryr5evcwEBBaQGutnbndhm4rRcv4'''' AND analysis_status = ''''completed''''"" 2>/dev/null | grep -q ""1""; then node check-avici-mints.js; break; fi; sleep 2; done')
